dict.acceptation: 恶劣的；肮脏的；卑劣的；下流的；
弄脏，污染；使名声受玷污；

sent.orig: The delivery location of anti-rubbed against dirty smoke get dirty straps or anti-against dirty gas path.
sent.trans: 播纸部位的不攻蹭脏机构次给有不攻蹭脏布带或不攻蹭脏气路两栽。

sent.orig: Jones: You dirty sod. You dirty old man!
sent.trans: 你这个下流的家伙。你这个下流的老男人！

sent.orig: His dirty hand makes the paper dirty.
A: Would you look at this! The utensils are dirty, the tablecloth is dirty.
sent.trans: 您看看这个！这些肮脏的餐具，桌巾也是。

sent.orig: But the Celtics didn't merely play a dirty brand of defense.
sent.trans: 不过凯尔特人队不仅仅是做出了有点脏的防守。
